text: @techinsider Yes. Two of the doctors that died smoked. China has the most smokers in the world. The coronavirus mostly kills smokers and the elderly. I’m so tired of cowards masking fear with ignorance and stupidity.

domain.name: Brand Category

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: French journalists show life in China amid the coronavirus outbreak
entity.description: Correspondents based in China for French news publications Le Figaro, Les Echos and France 2 have been reporting from the frontlines of the coronavirus crisis in Wuhan as well as from the capital city Beijing. Their photos and videos highlight the Chinese government's response to the outbreak, the nouveau "ghost towns" and the measures people are taking to avoid catching the illness.
